content:
How much will it cost to buy 3 of a specific item at a given price?
Item: Apple iPad
Price: $689

To calculate the total cost of buying 3 Apple iPads at a price of $689 each, you simply multiply the price by the quantity:

\[ \text{Total Cost} = \text{Price per iPad} \times \text{Quantity} \]

\[ \text{Total Cost} = 689 \times 3 = 2067 \]

So, it will cost $2,067 to buy 3 Apple iPads at $689 each.
